name: MEGA MAN BN 4 BLUE MOON
description: Lan and Mega Man face double trouble as an incoming asteroid heads straight for Earth and a mysterious NetNavi threatens the network's integrity! Game content is the same for MEGA MAN BN 4 BLUE MOON and MEGA MAN BN 4 RED SUN, but NetNavi chips and other items may differ. Five months after their battle with Dr. Wily, Lan and Mega Man have a chance encounter with a suspicious-looking NetNavi. Meanwhile, a NetBattle tournament has opened for all citizens in DenCity. Lan and Mega Man are ready to prove their worth! Strategize your attacks by collecting Battle Chips and activating Soul Unison to gain special abilities. During battle, take care of Mega Man's emotions and use DarkChips! Select Comm. on the PET screen to add special NetNavi chips to your inventory. While on the title screen, simultaneously press START, the L Button, and left on the +Control Pad to activate the chance of battling against Bass XX.
